Between Shades of Gray by Ruta Sepetys is a heartbreaking historical fiction story on the forgotten side of WWII. A Lithuanian girl, Lina, and her family are taken away from the NKVD along with thousands of other citizens, towards labor camps in Siberia. There, those people were to suffer and starve for crimes they didn't commit. This is a story about finding a ray of sunlight in a world full of darkness.
